author: Deeba Ahmed
description: Aim Labs uncovers EchoLeak, a zero-click AI flaw in Microsoft 365 Copilot that allows data theft via email. Learn how this vulnerability enables sensitive information exfiltration without user interaction and its implications for AI security.
title: EchoLeak Zero-Click AI Attack in Microsoft Copilot Exposes Company Data

author: Deeba Ahmed
description: A BitSight report reveals over 40,000 internet-connected security cameras globally are exposed, streaming live footage without protection. Learn how common devices, from home cameras to factory surveillance, pose privacy and security risks and get simple tips to secure your own.
title: US Tops List of Unsecured Cameras Exposing Homes and Offices
